verses.name: Psalms 119:82
verses.text: Mine eyes fail for thy word, saying, When wilt thou comfort me?

verses.name: Psalms 119:83
verses.text: For I am become like a bottle in the smoke; yet do I not forget thy statutes.

verses.name: Psalms 119:84
verses.text: How many are the days of thy servant? when wilt thou execute judgment on them that persecute me?

verses.name: Psalms 119:85
verses.text: The proud have digged pits for me, which are not after thy law.

verses.name: Psalms 119:86
verses.text: All thy commandments are faithful: they persecute me wrongfully; help thou me.

verses.name: Psalms 119:87
verses.text: They had almost consumed me upon earth; but I forsook not thy precepts.

verses.name: Psalms 119:88
verses.text: Quicken me after thy lovingkindness; so shall I keep the testimony of thy mouth.
